name: Forgotten Platformer
description:
The game is a 2D platformer where players must navigate through a variety of challenging levels while surviving against various enemies. The game features an equipment system where players can acquire and upgrade different weapons and armor to improve their character's stats.

In addition to the equipment system, the game also features a level up system where players can gain experience points and level up their character to unlock new abilities and skills. These abilities can be customized and built upon through a skill builder system, allowing players to tailor their character's abilities to their playstyle.

As players progress through the game, they will encounter increasingly difficult enemies and obstacles, requiring them to carefully manage their equipment and abilities in order to survive. The game also features a variety of environments and biomes, each with its own unique challenges and enemies.
